metadata.name: The New Hero's Journey
metadata.description:
The story that is told time and time again in a neverending loop. A new context of can be grasps from the shadows. I lurk in the shadow, digitally representing a new angle on this cycle of the hero's journey.

“The New Hero's Journey” has been optimized to be displayed on Dalbin Table.
This NFT is sold separately from the Table
Buy your Table on http://dalbin.com
The file resolution is 3840 x 2160 px (4K UHD).
